subject: NEW SHIPMENT NOTIFICATION
description_text:
New Page 27                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  					Today, Friday, 
7 November 2025                                        Dear 					Client,                                        As you may be 					aware, your package has now arrived at the customs office and 					requires customs duty payment to proceed with the delivery 					process. The customs duty amount is £2.99, and we kindly ask 					you to facilitate the payment to ensure the prompt release 					of your order.                                        To complete 					the customs duty payment process, please follow the 					instructions provided by the customs authorities. Once the 					payment is made, your package will be released and continue 					its journey to your address.					                                                                        
	Pay Now                                                                                                          If we are delivering to your home address and you have a 					dog, help us deliver safely by keeping it secure and out of 					the way before your postie arrives. Find out more about 					dog awareness.﻿                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     							*Please be aware any time shown is an estimate.
